body: Elzine, If you want to account for wall thickness here, just outline the borders of the windows, join the curves, and extrude them along the normal of the window using native GH components: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/nkLEPVQ6s9cV5NycMJodUS7kFx8kIW9tbzAafKCjiA450rfSMC6ieFHh3usBeQuDAf4GFIMJMws0U5rkQCUIWuAu7t7MUdcs/WindowBorder.JPG) I know that Daniel Nielsen was planning to write a single component that would take care of this but I don't think that he has gotten around to it yet. -Chris
